instructions

the ships placed in order are:

  • Carrier (occupies 5 spaces)
  • Battleship (4)
  • Cruiser (3)
  • Submarine (3)
  • Destroyer (2)

the default placement axis is the x-axis

If your press on an invalid spot the board will ignore it.
